content.text: Trial 1/5, Stage 'exit': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a black piece with a groove oriented horizontally from left to right. The red circle indicates the user's gaze, pointing towards the right side of the groove.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
